name: Delay (Mono)
description: This algorithm is a simple mono delay effect. The delay time can be set manually, via a clock pulse, or via MIDI clock. It can also be modulated via its ‘V/oct input’, which halves the delay time for every 1V rise in CV (conversely, doubles it for every 1V fall in CV). The ‘Fractional’ parameter allows for delay times that are not integer multiples of the sample rate, slightly increasing CPU load but improving sound quality when modulated. Turning fractional off creates a clean digital delay with no coloration.
gui_description: The interface includes controls for wet/dry mix, level adjustment, manual and modulated delay time settings, feedback, delay multiplier, fractional delay toggle, sync parameters (clock source, MIDI divisor/numerator), routing options (input/output buses, V/oct input selection), and a DC blocker switch.

parameters.name: Fractional
parameters.description: Enables fractional delay times, improving modulation quality but increasing CPU load.

parameters.name: Clock source
parameters.description: Chooses the clock source: 'None', 'Clock input', or 'MIDI clock'.

input_ports.name: Audio Input
input_ports.description: Main audio signal input for processing through the mono delay effect. Connected via 'Input' parameter.

input_ports.name: Clock Input (optional)
input_ports.description: External clock pulse input to synchronize delay time changes, selected via 'Clock source' and 'Clock input' parameters.

input_ports.name: V/oct CV Input
input_ports.description: CV modulation input for 1V/octave control of the delay time. Each +1V increases delay by a factor of two; each -1V halves it.

input_ports.name: V/oct input
input_ports.description: The input bus to use for 1V/octave modulation of the delay time.

output_ports.name: Audio Output
output_ports.description: Processed audio signal output, combining wet/dry mix according to 'Mix' and 'Level' parameters. Connected via 'Output' parameter.

output_ports.name: MIDI Clock (optional)
output_ports.description: If using MIDI clock synchronization, the algorithm responds to MIDI clock signals for delay time modulation.
